short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GSTIN Verifier Developed By RKIT Software Pvt. Ltd. www.rkitsoftware.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Party GSTIN number verification is crucial task while creating invoice. So with help of this extension used with miracle accounting software, Customer can easily verify Party GSTIN number to GST Common portal.
